--- Full Notice Text --- LEGAL ADVERTISEMENT OSCEOLA COUNTY BOARD OF COUNTY COMMISSIONERS PROJECTS: 1) RFP-26-15512-MB Support Services for Community Outreach, Social Media, and Marketing. There will be a VIRTUAL NON-MANDATORY PRE-PROPOSAL CONFERENCE on Wednesday, December 10, 2025, at 10:00 AM Local Time. Dial in at 407-906-2344, and when prompted, enter the following conference code: 219 431 781#.Please note the meeting will be audio recorded. Deadline for questions is Friday, December 12, 2025, at 12:00 PM Local Time. Due Date: Tuesday, January 6, 2026, at 2:00 PM Local Time. Contact: Melissa Baumwell (407) 742-0938. 2)RFLOI-26-15647-RR - Request for Letters of Interest to Purchase 25.27 +/- Acres of Real Property for Development. Deadline for questions is Friday, December 19, 2025, at 12:00 PM Local Time. Due Date: Tuesday, January 13, 2026, at 2:00 PM Local Time. Contact: Robert Rosenstein (407) 742-0941. FOR MORE INFORMATION, VISIT OSCEOLA COUNTYS VENDORLINK WEB SITE AT http://vendorlink.osceola.org [http://vendorlink.osceola.org]. December 4, 2025
